line.mandarin: 盘古开天辟地很久很久以前，
line.english: A long, long time ago when Pangu created the world,

line.mandarin: 天地还未开辟，
line.english: The world has not yet been opened,

line.mandarin: 整个宇宙混混沌沌，
line.english: The whole universe is chaotic,

line.mandarin: 像个大大的鸡蛋。
line.english: Like a big egg.

line.mandarin: 巨人盘古一动也不动，
line.english: The giant Pangu didn't move at all.

line.mandarin: 静静地酣睡在里面……盘古在这个像大鸡蛋一样的宇宙中慢慢地成长着。
line.english: Sleeping quietly and soundly inside... Pangu is growing slowly in this big egg-like universe.

line.mandarin: 大概过了一万八千多年，
line.english: About 18,000 years have passed,

line.mandarin: 这天，
line.english: this day,

line.mandarin: 熟睡中的盘古正在做着一个美梦。
line.english: Pangu, who was sleeping soundly, was having a sweet dream.

line.mandarin: 他被梦中美丽的景色惊醒了，
line.english: He was awakened by the beautiful scenery in his dream,

line.mandarin: 迫不及待地睁开睡意蒙眬的双眼，
line.english: I can't wait to open my sleepy eyes,

line.mandarin: 想要亲眼证实梦中的一切。
line.english: I want to confirm everything in my dream with my own eyes.

line.mandarin: 但是眼前的景象太令他失望了，
line.english: But the sight in front of him was too disappointing for him.

line.mandarin: 周围根本没有什么美景，
line.english: There is no beauty around at all,

line.mandarin: 而是漆黑漆黑的一片，
line.english: But it's pitch black,

line.mandarin: 什么都看不见。
line.english: Can't see anything.

line.mandarin: 他想伸展一下筋骨，
line.english: He wanted to stretch his muscles,

line.mandarin: 但“鸡蛋”紧紧包裹着身子，
line.english: But the "egg" is tightly wrapped around the body,

line.mandarin: 无法动弹。
line.english: Can't move.

line.mandarin: 他感到浑身燥热不堪，
line.english: He felt so hot all over,

line.mandarin: 呼吸非常困难。
line.english: Breathing is very difficult.

line.mandarin: 天哪！这该死的地方！盘古郁闷极了，
line.english: God! This damn place! Pangu was extremely depressed,

line.mandarin: 他想不能再这样待下去了。
line.english: He thought he couldn't stay like this any longer.

line.mandarin: 于是，
line.english: then,

line.mandarin: 他张开巨掌，
line.english: He spread his great palms,

line.mandarin: 挥动双臂猛力向黑暗中劈去。
line.english: Swinging his arms, he slammed into the darkness.

line.mandarin: “轰隆隆”一声巨响，
line.english: "Boom" a loud noise,

line.mandarin: 天地分开了。
line.english: Heaven and earth parted.

line.mandarin: 多少万年凝聚不动的混沌黑暗被搅动开来。
line.english: The chaotic darkness that had been condensed for tens of thousands of years was stirred up.

line.mandarin: 其中轻而清的阳气，
line.english: The light and clear yang energy,

line.mandarin: 徐徐地上升，
line.english: rising slowly,

line.mandarin: 逐渐向四周扩散开来，
line.english: Gradually spread around,

line.mandarin: 变成蓝蓝的天空；重而浊的阴气则沉沉下降，
line.english: Turned into a blue sky; the heavy and turbid cloud descended,

line.mandarin: 厚厚地堆积在一起，
line.english: piled up thickly,

line.mandarin: 变成了大地。
line.english: became the earth.

line.mandarin: 从此，
line.english: Since then,

line.mandarin: 混沌不分的宇宙变成了天和地，
line.english: The chaotic universe became heaven and earth,

line.mandarin: 不再是漆黑一片了。
line.english: It's not dark anymore.

line.mandarin: 盘古站立在天地中间，
line.english: Pangu stood in the middle of heaven and earth,

line.mandarin: 只觉得神清气爽。
line.english: Just feel refreshed.

line.mandarin: 虽然天和地是分开来了，
line.english: Although heaven and earth are separated,

line.mandarin: 但盘古没有被胜利冲昏头脑，
line.english: But Pangu was not dazzled by the victory,

line.mandarin: 他担心天和地会重新合在一起。
line.english: He worried that the sky and the earth would be reunited.

line.mandarin: 于是，
line.english: then,

line.mandarin: 他叉开双脚，
line.english: He spread his feet,

line.mandarin: 挺直了腰，
line.english: Straighten up,

line.mandarin: 稳稳地踩在地上，
line.english: firmly on the ground,

line.mandarin: 用昂起的头颅顶住天空。
line.english: Hold your head up against the sky.

line.mandarin: 接着，
line.english: then,

line.mandarin: 又施展法术，
line.english: and cast spells,

line.mandarin: 让自己的身体不停地增高。
line.english: Let your body keep growing.

line.mandarin: 每当盘古的身体增高一尺，
line.english: Whenever Pan Gu's body grew one foot taller,

line.mandarin: 天空就随之增高一尺，
line.english: The sky rises one foot higher,

line.mandarin: 大地也增厚一尺；每当盘古的身体增高一丈，
line.english: The earth also thickened by one foot; every time Pangu's body grew by one foot,

line.mandarin: 天空就随之增高一丈，
line.english: Then the sky rises one foot higher,

line.mandarin: 大地也增厚一丈。
line.english: The earth also thickened by ten feet.

line.mandarin: 盘古凭借着他对美好未来的信念，
line.english: Relying on his belief in a better future, Pangu,

line.mandarin: 就这样夜以继日地站立着。
line.english: Standing like this day and night.

line.mandarin: 又经过了一万八千多年的努力，
line.english: After more than 18,000 years of hard work,

line.mandarin: 天升得非常非常高，
line.english: The sky rises very, very high,

line.mandarin: 终于不能再高了；地沉得非常非常深，
line.english: At last it could go no higher; the ground sank very, very deep,

line.mandarin: 不能再厚了。
line.english: It couldn't be thicker.

line.mandarin: 盘古也长得非常非常高大了，
line.english: Pangu also grew very, very tall,

line.mandarin: 变成了一位顶天立地的巨人。
line.english: Become an indomitable giant.

line.mandarin: 盘古非常满意自己的杰作。
line.english: Pangu was very satisfied with his masterpiece.

line.mandarin: 啊！太棒了，
line.english: ah! marvelous,

line.mandarin: 自己竟然创造出这样一个崭新的世界！望着自己亲手开辟的天地，
line.english: I actually created such a brand new world! Looking at the world I created with my own hands,

line.mandarin: 他开心地笑了。
line.english: He smiled happily.

line.mandarin: 但盘古并不满足，
line.english: But Pangu was not satisfied,

line.mandarin: 他又在心里暗暗地规划着未来的蓝图——那就是他在睡梦中看到的一个有着日月山川和人类万物的、
line.english: He secretly planned the blueprint for the future in his heart—that is, a world with the sun, moon, mountains and rivers and all human beings that he saw in his sleep.

line.mandarin: 无限光明美丽的世界。
line.english: Infinitely bright and beautiful world.

line.mandarin: 只是盘古为了开天辟地，
line.english: It's just that Pangu wanted to open up the world,

line.mandarin: 此刻已耗尽了自己全部的体力和精力，
line.english: I've exhausted all my strength and energy now.

line.mandarin: 他知道他已不能看到自己规划的蓝图实现了。
line.english: He knew that he could no longer see the blueprint of his plan realized.

line.mandarin: 这个顶天立地的汉子忍不住流下了眼泪。
line.english: This indomitable man couldn't help but shed tears.

line.mandarin: 然而这时，
line.english: However at this time,

line.mandarin: 他的眼泪汇成了江河湖海，
line.english: His tears merged into rivers and lakes,

line.mandarin: 他的喃喃自语变成了滚天作响的雷霆。
line.english: His murmurs turned into thunderous thunder.

line.mandarin: 他口里所呼出的气息，
line.english: the breath that came out of his mouth,

line.mandarin: 变成了孕育万物的春风和天空中的云雾。
line.english: It has become the spring breeze that breeds all things and the clouds in the sky.

line.mandarin: 他的左眼变成了光芒万丈的太阳，
line.english: His left eye became a radiant sun,

line.mandarin: 照耀大地；他的右眼变成了一轮皎洁的月亮，
line.english: Shining on the earth; his right eye became a bright moon,

line.mandarin: 给夜晚带来光明；他的头发和胡须变成了天空中闪烁的星辰，
line.english: Brings light to the night; his hair and beard become the twinkling stars of the sky,

line.mandarin: 照亮夜空。
line.english: Light up the night sky.

line.mandarin: 他的汗水变成了滋润万物的雨露，
line.english: His sweat has become the rain that moistens all things,

line.mandarin: 他身上的汗毛变成了布满大地的花草和树木，
line.english: The fine hairs on his body turned into flowers and trees covering the earth,

line.mandarin: 他的头变成了东岳泰山，
line.english: His head turned into Dongyue Taishan,

line.mandarin: 肚子变成了中岳嵩山，
line.english: The stomach has become Zhongyue Songshan,

line.mandarin: 左臂变成了南岳衡山，
line.english: The left arm has become Nanyue Hengshan,

line.mandarin: 右臂变成了北岳恒山，
line.english: The right arm became Beiyue Hengshan,

line.mandarin: 脚变成了西岳华山，
line.english: The foot becomes Xiyue Huashan,

line.mandarin: 让大地呈现出一片壮丽的景象。
line.english: Let the earth present a magnificent scene.

line.mandarin: 他的肌肉变成了肥沃的田地，
line.english: His muscles became fertile fields,

line.mandarin: 供万物生存；他的牙齿、
line.english: for all things to live; his teeth,

line.mandarin: 骨骼和骨髓，
line.english: bones and marrow,

line.mandarin: 变成了洁白的玉石和地下无穷无尽的宝藏，
line.english: Turned into pure white jade and endless treasures underground,

line.mandarin: 供人们使用。
line.english: for people to use.

line.mandarin: 盘古生前完成开天辟地的伟大业绩，
line.english: During his lifetime, Pan Gu accomplished great feats of opening up the world,

line.mandarin: 死后永远留给后人无穷无尽的宝藏，
line.english: After death, there will always be endless treasures left to future generations,

line.mandarin: 成为中华民族崇拜的英雄。
line.english: Become a hero worshiped by the Chinese nation.
